eu.profinit.manta.dataflow.repository.persistence.repository

Interface BaseVertexRepository<T extends eu.profinit.manta.dataflow.repository.model.domain.AbstractVertex>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - vertex type (domain class)
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    AttributeRepository, LayerRepository, NodeRepository, ResourceRepository, RevisionRepository, SourceRepository

    public interface BaseVertexRepository<T extends eu.profinit.manta.dataflow.repository.model.domain.AbstractVertex>
    Base Repository for all vertex-based entities of domain model. Provides all specific Repositories with basic read operations.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      T find(java.lang.Long id)
      Finds a specific vertex by its ID.
      java.util.List<T> query(eu.profinit.manta.dataflow.repository.model.query.VertexParameter query)
      Queries all vertexes of given type which match provided query criteria.

    • Method Detail

      • query

        java.util.List<T> query(eu.profinit.manta.dataflow.repository.model.query.VertexParameter query)
        Queries all vertexes of given type which match provided query criteria. Query criteria can be null in order to return all vertexes.
        Parameters:
        query - query object containing all criteria (filters) for the query, nullable
        Returns:
        list of vertexes matching given criteria

      • find

        T find(java.lang.Long id)
        Finds a specific vertex by its ID. TODO validate vertex labels
        Parameters:
        id - id of vertex to be returned
        Returns:
        mapped domain object
